column1: Smoque BBQ////My new favorite BBQ in Chicago! What a great meal. These guys sure know how to get BBQ done right! I had the brisket platter with 2 sides. Brisket was cooked perfectly
column2: tasted great and was temperature hot. Not common in many bbq joints as it's obviously easy to dry out. I chose sliced brisket as you have choice to try chopped. The brisket was juicy
column3: flavorful and looked awesome with a healthy smoke ring. My guest had the St. Louis style ribs which were also great! Nice flavorful dry rub and cooked to perfection. Not fall apart nor too tough
column4: just right! The sides were highlighted by their baked beans. Good smoky flavor with lots of bacon and brisket chunks throughout. The Mac n cheese was ok as was their vinegar based coke slaw.
